entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
